bwwExcerpt: : If you're looking for a sleek, swift and superbly sung evening to take you out of yourself, the Brooks Atkinson Theatre, where the musical marked its official opening Sunday, fits ideally in your itinerary. At times, the vibe becomes so contagious that it may float you out of your very seat.

keyPhrases.quote: sleek, swift and superbly sung evening to take you out of yourself
